com.viaoa.web.servlet

Class JNLPServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.viaoa.web.servlet.JNLPServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class JNLPServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    servlet used to serve up JNLP files, and dynamically set the codebase data, and other information within the jnlp text file. This will also rename any references to jar files to match the "versioned" name that is stored in a jar directory.
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
